name: .WUX File Extension
summary: Learn about .WUX files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can decompress WUX files with the Wii U image compression tool, which results in a WUD file. You can also simply open a WUX file in Cemu by selecting File â†’ Load and choosing the WUX file you want to open.
